Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I make a point-to-point VoIP call over Wifi?  I am searching for a way to make a point to point VOIP call between two Android devices without having any intermediate server(SIP server) or an internet connection.I just have an access point (or multiple access point connect via LAN) and I want to make VOIP calls over Wi-Fi only.Is that possible? And if it's possible is there any tutorial that could help me in applying such solution?
Title: How to make point to point VOIP call between two Android devices?

history.Text: I am searching for an application to make a point to point VOIP call between two android devices without having any intermediate server(SIP server) or an internet connection. I just have an access point (or multiple access point connect via LAN) and I want to make VOIP calls over WIFI only. Is that possible ?and if it's possible is there any tutorial could help me in making such program??

I am searching for a way to make a point to point VOIP call between two Android devices without having any intermediate server(SIP server) or an internet connection.I just have an access point (or multiple access point connect via LAN) and I want to make VOIP calls over Wi-Fi only.Is that possible? And if it's possible is there any tutorial that could help me in applying such solution?
How to make point to point VOIP call between two Android devices?
